data.message: Sooooooo......how do we sign up or enroll in this?

replies.message: Hey Cyndi. No need to sign up or enroll. Once activated, if you are in the affected area, you will get a Facebook notification, see an alert at the top of your News Feed and receive an SMS from Facebook about Safety Check . Learn more about Safety Check here: https://www.facebook.com/about/safetycheck/. -Hailey
How do we activate and is there a charge?
Once I click on link, there's nothing else to do??
Cyndi Kinsella did you really just ask if there is a charge? You don't need a Facebook.
Please - they charge for promoting businesses on here just so people can see them... Why wouldn't they wanna charge for something else lol
Ya, I just checked it out. Sounds good but how is it activated as there's no sign-up or enrollment?
I guess ppl will know if I'm ok or not when I'm either posting statues on fb or haven't been on fb for awhile.
Facebook knows where you are if you are on it from your cell phone. They used that plus the information of where the affected area is to give you the alert
Thank you Shannon for your comment after Brice"s...
Cyndi and Shannon - FB has never charged for personal use. It's free because of ads and yes makes money off you if you are promoting a business. Not the same as personal use.
In other words hope you got the on.  No I do turn off the phone until my truck is parked or wen I'm Not driving. .I use the flip phones so guess I'll be late on tht info.
